text: Brave People () is a 1950 Soviet movie directed by Konstantin Yudin.Смелые людиГоспитализирована вдова Леонида Гайдая, актриса Нина Гребешкова It stars Sergei Gurzo, Alexey Gribov, and Tamara Chernova. ==Actors== *Sergei Gurzo - Vasily Terentevich Govorukhin *Alexey Gribov - Konstantin Sergeevich Voronov *Tamara Chernova - Nadezhda Petrovna Voronova *Oleg Solyus *Nikolay Mordvinov - Kozhin *Vladimir Dorofeev - Kapiton Kapitonovich == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1950 movies Category:Movies directed by Konstantin Yudin
title: Brave People
